description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Enterprise Manager RESTful API - Pulls out all the VBR Information, Jobs, Jobs Duration, Protected VMs, Replicated VMs, etc.

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "veeamRepositoryName"  fill(none)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - (mean("Percent_Free_Space")) FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$veeamserver$/ ) AND ("instance" !='HarddiskVolume1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(linear)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("veeamReplicaSessionsJobResult") FROM "veeam_em_job_sessions" WHERE ("veeamReplicaSessionsName" =~ /^$replicajob$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "veeamReplicaSessionsName" fill(none)

panels.title: $veeamserver v$veeamversionM ($veeamversion) - Job Historical Performance and Duration

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_em_overview WITH KEY=host
list.label: Enterprise Manager
list.name: enterprisemanager
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_em_overview WITH KEY=host
